quizDescription: Think you know your favorite movie quotes? Test your knowledge with this quiz filled with iconic lines from famous films.

questions.question: Complete this famous movie quote: 'May the Force be ____.'
questions.explanation: This famous quote is from Star Wars, and it's 'May the Force be with you.'

questions.question: Which movie features the quote: 'Here's looking at you, kid.'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'Here's looking at you, kid.' is from the movie Casablanca.

questions.question: In which film does a character say: 'There's no place like home.'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'There's no place like home.' is from The Wizard of Oz.

questions.question: Which movie includes the quote: 'You can't handle the truth!'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'You can't handle the truth!' is from the movie A Few Good Men.

questions.question: Which classic film features the quote: 'Here's Johnny!'?
questions.explanation: The famous line 'Here's Johnny!' is from the movie The Shining.

questions.question: In which movie is the line: 'Life is like a box of chocolates; you never know what you're gonna get.'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'Life is like a box of chocolates; you never know what you're gonna get.' is from Forrest Gump.

questions.question: Which film features the line: 'I'll be back.'?
questions.explanation: The iconic line 'I'll be back.' is from the movie The Terminator.

questions.question: In which movie does a character say: 'Houston, we have a problem.'?
questions.explanation: The line 'Houston, we have a problem.' is from the movie Apollo 13.

questions.question: Which film includes the quote: 'You talking to me?'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'You talking to me?' is from the movie Taxi Driver.

questions.question: Which movie features the quote: 'To infinity and beyond!'?
questions.explanation: The quote 'To infinity and beyond!' is from the movie Toy Story.
